text1: IT-Club is a bridge between the course and real work
text8: Motion Web IT academy is an international educational project that prepares IT practitioners.
text9: Through our continuous development, we have developed effective training programs for IT specialists. We managed to combine the best practices of offline and online education and thus achieve high results.
text15: Frontend Developer - is a specialist who creates user interfaces
text16: UX/UI design is the process of creating interactive, user-friendly interfaces
text21: Feel the friendly atmosphere of our academy! Leave a request for a trial lesson and get closer to your goal!
text28:
In the course, you will learn how to create web service interfaces using languages
                                    programming and additional technologies. Can you develop planners?
                                    tasks, instant messengers, online stores
text30:
Our company provides Open Space for our students, where you can comfortably
                                    study, make friends with other students and develop skills
                                    communications
text32:
At the moment, the market is more in demand for specialists who speak English
                                    language, as this makes it possible to bring the product to the world stage. That's why we
                                    we provide our students with FREE language courses
text34:
IT-Club is a bridge between the course and real work. Analyzing courses in Bishkek, we
                                    decided to open a club that will help students prepare for real projects.
                                    Participants without completing the course will be able to understand how to work in a team, learn
                                    present their work and understand what problems are at the development stage
